author: Odeinoichus
title: Rockin' in NINJAGO City!
review:
Set #71019 Gong & Guitar Rocker: This citizen of NINJAGO City is one of a few non-Ninja characters from the CMF line, re-using some decent parts of the past with new prints to capture the great look of this rockin' figure.

G&G Rocker includes dual-molded legs so you can have torn ripped black jeans/pants with white sneakers underneath. His red shirt is printed with a great skull and crossbones design and his arm includes a tattoo on the shoulder. His hair was first used with the LEGO Hippie in Series 7, this time it's in black with a red headband, he also includes the rock guitar accessory in red with white and silver detailing. He also features double-sided facial expressions, with one serious looking expression and the other in mid-song.

Overall this is a pretty decent looking figure and I'm pleased to have him in my collection. I'd definitely recommend him, if nothing else than for his parts, since they are so versatile for fans of MOCing figs.
